documents.document:
The Swatter and The Fly

Oh honey just look at what you've become
Look at who you are, just another stupid fool
What didn't you understand?
What didn't you get?
When I said I was over you.

You try to guilt trip me with those looks
I get pictures from you, arms with cuts
Look at the state of you, you fuckin’ fool
I'm so over this, just give me the knife
I'll do it for you

You used to say you loved me
But only [after] you beat me black and blue
Honey your definition of love doesn't suit mine
The smack of your fist, the split of my lip
Was the only kiss I ever got from you

And you think that it's so damn easy
You just walk away like it never happened
Well you've got another thing coming babe
I've had it up to here, don't make a move
Honey this bullet is just for you

[Irony] You used to ask
What could drive someone [To take a life]
Guess what Honey you're gonna find out
Your time is up
The roles have changed

Because now [I'm] the swatter and [you're] the fly

Tommy Tragedy 17-6-2007

Happy Endings[Fairytales]

Cinderella married her Prince Charming
-x-Happy Endings don’t exist-x-

Perfection bound between the covers of a book
-x-Fairytales are an alternate reality-x-

Take this ring in holy matrimony
-x-The divorce is finalised for all eternity-x-

Love each other till death do you part
-x-She killed him, bullet ripped through his heart-x-

He is a boy his father is so proud of
-x-Secretly he SCREAMS inside, he’s gay-x-

Mother loves her daughter so much
-x-Inside she’s everything her mother hates-x-

He goes to school so full of promise
-x-He sits alone at recess and cries-x-

She’s living a wonderfully rich material life
-x-She fucks it up with drugs all in one night-x-

His green eyes shine with a brand new day
-x-Masking the agony brought by his fathers hand, hiding the pain -x-

Everyday she smiles at life and stands up tall
-x-At night she begs her boy to help her blow her brain upon the wall-x-

Romeo and Juliet, lovers in the making, they had it all
-x-Both of them died together on the cathedral floor-x-

Happy Endings and Fairytales are what we wish to see
But behind every Happy Ending there is a tragedy

---x---

I’m not afraid of Happy Endings
Im just afraid that they won’t work out for me

Blood Stained Bathroom Floor

With a knife
He engraves a name
Marks the blade
With his regrets
A tinted poison
Digs it deep
A story carved into his arm
That would frighten a child in their sleep

A waste of life
A waste of breath
A waste of time
Hurtling closer to death
One regret
Two regrets
Three, fuck even four
Are you blind?
Can’t you see?
He just doesn’t give a shit anymore

One regret
Two regrets
Three regrets
Four
Takes a needle
Stabs it down
And ends his life forever more
Upon the blood stained bathroom floor

A Mutual Understanding

Upon the park bench
A boy sits alone
[He hugs himself tight]
Heart on his sleeve
Tears fall from his eyes

Ocean sunset bathes him in warmth
A warmth that [cannot] be felt
Orange reflection trying in vain
To penetrate his cold gray sight
[See no affection]

He dares himself to forget
Wishes for it all to just
=Go away=
Maybe if he closes his eyes
The bruises will disappear

Orange turns to purple
Purple turns to blue
Twilit protection
Helps the boy decide what to do
[He can’t go back home]

And as the moon rises
While the rest of San Francisco slumbers
A stranger takes his hand
Tells him it’ll all be ok
Because he understands

Together they stand
High upon the Golden Gate
Hands clasped together
A silent sign that says
It will all be all right

Below a perfect copy of the sky
Twinkles at them
The moon’s double shines
And together
Hand in hand
They jump into the moon
Each with a person who finally…
-[Understands]-

Nothing Can Compare (Song)

Hello there. Well, this week has only just begun and well, atm it is still rather boring. School is dull at the present time...which is amazing for us! lol. Oh, but, today in Math my friends and I were talking about this person who put a fish inside them instead of a dildo....YUCK!!! POOR FISH!!
Anyways...below is a song i wrote a while ago...tell me what u think. The format is outta wack cos I cant or dont know how, to center it!

Nothing Can Compare

We’ve had our differences and we’ve had our fights
All the harmful shit we said those nights
Those words we meant to crush our souls and destroy our hearts
Have no harm because we know in truth they’re all lies.
Because no matter what we’ll always love each other
(No matter what)
For all eternity
Until we die

And nothing can compare to when you hold my hand
and swear your loves for me
Nothing can compare to when you hold my hand
and swear your loves for me
(Mmmm, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah…)

Your parents may hate me and my sister may want you
The stresses in life may wear me down
Throw me around
Kick me while Im down
But I’ll always know where to go to find comfort
To find solace in life’s hash light
To find the strength to live
To be me
You’ll never take me for granted
Never say I whine
(No, never)
But what you will do is gather me up in your arms
And tell me it will all be fine
(All be fine)

And
Nothing can compare to when you hold my hand
and swear your loves for me
Nothing can compare to when you hold my hand
and swear your loves for me
(Mmmm, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah…)

So here we lay in each other’s arms
Watching the heavens and souls of the dead
Flash by in form of shooting stars
and when you kiss me
at the moment our lips meet
I can hear your heart beat out my name
To the gravity of love
(Gravity of love)
And in that instant I know we’ll never part
Because no matter what we’ll always love each other
(No matter what)
For all eternity
Until we die

And nothing can compare to when you hold my hand
and swear your loves for me
Nothing can compare to when you hold my hand
and swear your loves for me
(Mmmm, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah…)

And nothing can compare to when you hold my hand
and swear your loves for me…
(Swear your loves for me)

Broken (Poem)

Hey all. The poem below is about a friend of mine. He’s really down but hiding it well, but when he lets his barriers down this is what I see:

Broken

Boy, you’re broken
Tears fill your eyes
And what you say
Makes the world stand still
You need love

Boy, you’re alone
You say you’re ok
But I know that you’re not
You don’t need to hide the truth
Im here for you

Take my hand
Live while you can
Let me be your angel
And take you on a dream
Take you away from reality

Boy, when you cry
Does your spirit die?
When you shout
Is your heart strung out?
When you fall
Do you lose it all?
When you scream
No one notices at all…

You’re slipping away
You’re losing control
Losing the battle
You’re starting to fall
Spiralling down
Hitting the ground
Something’s gonna give
You’re losing the will
To live…

Boy, undone
Not long now

Shady Lane 1-3-2007

Gray, Black [&] White

Hey, I'm just really confused about a certain aspect of my life at the moment. My friends will know what I'm talking about...everyone else will just know I'm confused. I wrote a poem about it...I needed a release...so I wrote it down.

"Gray, Black [&] White"

Spiralling down
Out of control
Losing the will
Hitting the floor

Closing my eyes
The tears slide
Finding the knife
Ending my life

I’ve lost it all
I see no light
I believe that in this world
There is every shade of gray
Black and white

All the colors gone
Dampening the spark
That I’ve been holding onto
For forever and a day

What do I do
To make everything ok
To figure out what I am…
…I’m going quietly insane

Maybe I’ll go for a walk
Maybe out in the rain
Think about everything and nothing
Let the tears fall
And end all the pain

Thursday 8th March

Cigarettes 0 (v. bloody g.) Number of times worried about health, 200 (feels like) Calories, 375 (v.g.)

Have decided to write blog like Bridget Jones, will see how long this idea lasts as have bad habit of getting bored very quickly.

8.34p.m

Fainted today on morning train, during peak hour, was very bad. Woke up to people asking if I was ok and helping me up whilst I was sweating and was blind with bright white dots in front of eyes. Hurt both knees in process and have been hobbling around.
Had a hectic day afterwards with Maths test in first period, English spoken presentation in third period and History exam in seventh period. Am buggered and in dire need of caffeine. Did however have a rather odd conversation during a free period with Vanessa and Lucretia about what investigators look for when a dead body is found (Lucretia was over due on homework and Vanessa and I were helping) When Vanessa and I mentioned looking for seminal fluid, torn tissue around the vaginal cavity and foreign pubic hairs Lucretia refused to right them down upon which V and I suggested she write down ‘rape kit’ instead. Lucretia had images of a rape kit containing ‘hand cuffs…etc’ so we made her write next to it NOT BONDAGE.

Losing It

I'm feeling like shit...you dont need to know why...but I do. Below is a poem (combined with Evanescence lyrics) Its a bit choppy, but meh.

Feels Like Flying

One Cold Starry Night
You’ll Take My Hand; Step By Step
You’ll Lead Me To The Highest Edge
And Teach Me How To Fly

Dear My Love
Haven’t You Longed To Be Free
Take My Hand
You’re Leaving Tonight

Close Your Eyes
Feel The Breeze
[Let Your Fears Wash Away]
Move A Little Bit Closer
And Let Gravity Play
[Play]

Forget This Life
Come With Me
Don’t Look Back You’re Safe Now
No Ones Left To Stop You…..
.| x /|.
…..Falling Feels Like Flying
……Until You Hit The Ground……

"Just Another Teenage Suicide"

"Just Another Teenage Suicide"

He can’t find any way out
He’s trapped and all alone
Today’s the day, without a doubt
Its time for him to go

How stupid could he be?
A simpleton could see
That life’s just not for him
And death is all that he can see

He’s unable to speak
Except to cry out
And all he can feel is the pain
Of the hand life has dealt

And images of failure run through his mind
Of hurt and of pain
How everything he’s touched
Breaks down at the seams

So now with those thoughts in his mind
He walks through the quad wishing he was dead
He raises the gun and closes his eyes
And puts a bullet through his head

Everything changes, everything falls apart

--------.x?x.--------

How stupid could we be?
A simpleton could see
That life just wasn’t for him
And death was all that he could see

Shady Lane 28-3-2007

It Doesn't Matter

It doesn’t matter what I want
It doesn’t matter what I need
It doesn’t matter if cry
It don’t matter if I bleed.

If I decided to pack my bags and go
No one would ask me to stay
No one would beg or plead
Or stop me from going away

Sometimes I find life ok
Sometimes I want to die
Sometimes I want to live
But everyday I ask myself why

But no matter how I act
No matter how I’m seen
I am never showing the real me
Im just a masked tragedy

It doesn’t matter what I want
It doesn’t matter what I need
It doesn’t matter if cry
It don’t matter if I bleed.

People push their happiness in my face
They make me see what I lack
And even though it doesn’t really show
It’s fucking killing me

Take me away
Let me leave
I don’t ever want to see
Your love in front of me

I wish this would stop
I never wanted this to be
I’m turning into something
I don’t want my friends to see

I feel the stain of tears
As my tears begin to flow
And I want all of you to know
That I’m sorry for being me

I’m sorry

It doesn’t matter what I want
It doesn’t matter what I need
It doesn’t matter if cry
It don’t matter if I bleed.

And please…

Don’t tell me that it does
Because it doesn’t to me

red, black, blue, green, yellow?

THE ANSWERS

1. You are completely in love with this person.

2. If you choose:

Red - You are alert and your life is full of
love.

Black - You are conservative and aggressive.

Green - Your soul is relaxed and you are laid
back.

Blue - You are spontaneous and love kisses
and affection from the ones you love.

Yellow- you are a very happy person and give
good advice to those who are down.

3. If your initial is:

A-K You have a lot of love and friendships in
your life.

L-R You try to enjoy your life to the maximum
and your love life is
soon to blossom.

S-Z You like to help others and your future love
life looks very good.

4. If you were born in:

Jan-Mar: The year will go very well for you and
you will discover that you fall in love with
someone totally unexpected.

April-June: You will have a strong love
relationship that will not last long but the
memories will last forever.

July-Sep: You will have a great year and will
experience a major life changing experience for
the good.

Oct-Dec: Your love life will not be too great,
but eventually you will find your soul mate.

5. If you chose...

Black: Your life will take on a different
direction, it will seem hard at the time but
will be the best thing for you, and you will
be glad for the change.

White: You will have a friend who completely
confides in you and would do anything for you,
but you may not realize it.

6. This person is your best friend.

7. This is how many close friends you have in
your lifetime.

8. If you chose:
California: You like adventure.
Florida: You are a laid back person.

9. If you chose:

Lake: You are loyal to your friends and to your
love. And you are very reserved.

Ocean: You are spontaneous and like to please
people.

10. This wish will come true only if you RE-POST THIS BULLETIN

No one deserves this

Boy:what?

Girl: I really like you. And I... I think I'm falling in love with you.

Boy: Ok...

Girl: What do you mean "ok"?

Boy: I don't like you like that...

Girl: Why not?

Boy: I can't tell you... maybe another time...

From then on, the girl kept asking the boy "Why not?" whenever she saw him, and he kept answering the same answer of "I'll tell you later." Finally the girl got fed up.

Girl: I'm tired of this! Tell me why you don't like me!

Boy: Do you really wanna know why?

Girl: Yes!

Boy: It's because you're ugly as fuck! What's the point of going out with someone when they're not pretty?!

Girl: But... I...

Boy: Just shut up and leave me alone!

The boy leaves and the girl is sitting there alone, crying her heart out. Then her cell phone rings.

Girl: Hello?

Mom: Sweetheart? I want you to go home, ok? I'll be home from work in a few hours.

Girl: Alright Mom.

Mom: I love you.

Girl: I love you too, Mom.

Mom: Bye Bye.

Girl: Bye

The girl heads home and once she got there, she went in the bathroom and looked at herself in the mirror.

Girl: I'm not pretty enough...

She set to work, knowing fully well what she was going to do. 2 hours later, her Mom came home and heard the bath water running. She went upstairs to find the hallway flooded so she knocked on the door.

Mom: Honey? Are you alright?

She opened the door and was shocked at the site. The bath was overflowing onto the floor, and the water was tinted red. She walked over to see what was inside and screamed. There, her little girl was lying with cuts all over her face and wrists. Her Mom backed away and was going to run to call the police when something caught her eye. On the mirror, am I pretty enough now?

No one deserves to be told that by someone they love. If you find it messed up then forward this to everyone you know.

A person's appearance doesn't count. What counts is their heart inside of them and their personality. No one wants to be told they're not good enough...

Repost this in 5 Min or something bad will happen 2 U tomorrow
saying-

"Am I Pretty Enough Now?"if ur a girl.

If you're a guy repost as "No one deserves this"
